text: Carlos Del Toro (born 1961) is a Cuban-born American retired military officer and businessman. He was the 78th United States Secretary of the Navy from 2021 until 2025. He worked for the Office of the Secretary of Defense and special assistant to the director and deputy director of the Office of Management and Budget. He was also the commanding officer of the USS Bulkeley. In June 2021, President Joe Biden nominated Del Toro to serve as the United States Secretary of the Navy. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Politicians from New York City Category:American military people Category:Cuban military people Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Cuban politicians Category:1961 births Category:United States Secretaries of the Navy
title: Carlos Del Toro
